allowedCategoriesDescriptionHelp: Kategorien die in dieser Gruppe verwendet werden können
applyXSLToRecordHelp: Das beigefügte XSL wird auf jeden Metadatensatz übertragen, bevor es Geonetwork hinzugefügt wird.
avgViewsPerDay: Druchschnittliche Anzahl Besuche auf der Seite pro Tag
avgViewsPerMonth: Druchschnittliche Anzahl Besuche auf der Seite pro Monat
vacuum-element: Entferne Elemente mit Leerwert nach der Ersetzung
vacuum-record: Entferne alle leeren Elemente im Datensatz nach der Ersetzung
batchreplacer-replacementsConfig-help: Definieren Sie eine Liste von Ersetzungen. Beim Laden werden existierende Ersetzungen entfernt. Der Elementname und Suchwert kann ein  regulärer Ausdruck sein, z.B.  'iso19139\..*\.organisationName' um allen Organisationsnamen , 'dublin-core.simpledc.publisher' um Dublin Core Herausgeber zu entsprechen.
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.or.name: Feature Catalogue Citation > OnlineRes > Name
batchreplacer-el-ci.citation.organisatio: Feature Catalogue Citation > Name der Organisation
batchreplacer-el-di.transferOptions.name: Digital Transfer Options > Name
batchreplacer-el-id.contact.or.name: Contact > OnlineRes > Name
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.poc.or.ap: Point Of Contact > OnlineRes > Anwendungs Profil
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.poc.or.name: Point Of Contact > OnlineRes > Name
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.gc.useLi: Resource Constraints > General Constraint > Use Limitation
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.lc.other: Resource Constraints > Security Constraint > Use Limitation
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.lc.useLi: Resource Constraints > Legal Constraints > Use Limitation
batchreplacer-el-id.dataid.resc.sc.useLi: Resource Constraints > General Constraint > Use Limitation
batchreplacer-el-id.serviceid.poc.or.ap: Point Of Contact > OnlineRes > Anwendungs Profil
batchreplacer-el-mi.contact.or.name: Contact > OnlineRes > Name
cantDeleteGroupHavingRecords: Diese Gruppe enthält Datensätze. Verschieben Sie sämtliche Datensätze in eine andere Gruppe, um die Gruppe zu löschen.
cantDeleteUserHavingRecords: Benutzer, die über Datensätze verfügen, können nicht gelöscht werden. Übertragen Sie die Datensätze auf andere Benutzer.
categoryDescriptionHelp: Standardkategorie für in dieser Gruppe erzeugte Metadaten
chooseFormatter: Wählen Sie ein Stylesheet für den Upload
formatterUploadError: Fehler beim Laden des Formatierer aufgetreten
chooseLogos: Wählen oder hinterlegen Sie ein Bild
chooseRecordsToUpdate: Wählen Sie Datensatzätze für die Verarbeitung
chooseSourceEditor: Wählen Sie einen Editor aus von dem Sie Daten übertragen möchten.
confirmDeleteSchematronCriteria: Möchten Sie das Kriterium wirklich löschen?
confirmDeleteSchematronCriteriaGroup: Möchten Sie die Kriterien-Gruppe wirklich löschen?
contactAsXML: XML-Fragment, das verwendet werden kann, wenn ein Kontakt ersetzt wird.
enableThesaurusHelp: Diese Option im Multinode Modus verweden, um einen Thesaurus für diesen Node zu aktivieren oder deaktivieren.
cron-0 15 10 ? * MON-FRI: Jeden Montag, Dienstag, Mittwoch, Donnerstag und Freitag um 10:15 starten
csw-capabilitiesUrlHelp: CSW URL mit oder ohne GetCapabilities Parameter
csw-rejectDuplicateResource: Suche nach Doppel-Einträgen, basierdend auf der UUID
csw-rejectDuplicateResourceHelp: Vergleich wird auf dem Element 'gmd:identificationInfo/*/gmd:citation/gmd:CI_Citation/gmd:identifier/*/gmd:code/gco:CharacterString' durchgeführt. Es wird nur auf Datensätze in ISO19139 oder ISO Profilen angewandt.
noCswCriteriaFoundInCapabilities: No search criteria found in capabilities. All records will be harvested from that server.
CswCriteriaFoundInCapabilities: Optionally use one or more search criteria below to restrict the records to harvest.
errorRetrievingCswCapabilities: Error occurred while retrieving service capabilities. Check service URL or current status.
csw-outputSchemaHelp: The URI identifier of the metadata standard to request from the CSW server.  The server must support the standard.  The supported standards are listed in the CSW Capabilities document under the GetRecordById operation.
customizeElementSetHelp: Define elements to be included in your custom element set here. Each element must be identified by its full XPATH from the document root. These elements and their descendants will be included in responses to CSW GetRecord requests with ElementSetName=FULL. To revert to the default ElementSetName=FULL responses, delete all elements from this list.
defineCatalogLogo: Definiere ein Logo für den Katalog
defineUserGroupsPerProfile: Für jedes Profil die Benutzergruppen wählen
deleteHarvesterHelp: Lösche Harvester und alle zugehörigen Datensätze
virtualCswUpdateError: Oops, Fehler beim anlegen des virtuellen CSW
dupNameWarning: Es existiert bereits eine Gruppe mit diesem Namen. Bitte wählen Sie einen anderen Namen.
emptyCatalogShouldBeFilled: Der Katalog ist leer. Sie wollen wahrscheinlich Datensätze importieren oder einen Harvester konfigurieren. Sie können auch Vorlagen imnportieren: Import von Vorlagen, Metadatensatz Beispiel importieren: Import von Metadaten Beispielen oder beides importieren.
facetIndicatorHelp: Statistics by records are defined based on facets configuration and may represent only the most frequent values.
filesystem-checkFileLastModifiedForUpdat: Update catalog record only if file was updated
Update catalog record only if file was updated
filesystem-directoryHelp: File path to the directory to harvest on the server
filesystem-nodelete: Keep catalog record even if deleted at source
filesystem-nodeleteHelp: Keep catalog record even if deleted at source
filesystem-recurseHelp: If true then the subfolders will also be search for metadata
formatterUploadHelp: A formatter is a ZIP containing a set of file defining a custom metadata layout.
formatterCacheHelp: Formatters are responsible for all metadata views.  In order to improve performance the output values are cached when a request is made.  The cache is automatically updated when the metadata is updated but when the formatter's themselves are modified, the cache must be cleared so that the new output will be created
formatterCacheCleared: The cached values in the Formatter Cache have been successfully cleared
formatCacheClearFailure: An error occurred while attempting to clear the formatter cache
geoPREST-hostHelp: The url of the geoPREST server
geonetwork-createRemoteCategory: Set category if they exist locally
geonetwork-createRemoteCategoryHelp: If true then use the category set on the metadata in the remote server also locally (assuming it exists locally)
geonetwork-customCriteriaHelp: Define whatever criteria supported by the remote node and not available in the predifined filters (eg. 'similarity' set to '1' for non fuzzy search). You may specify multiple criteria separated by ';' (eg. _schema;siteId with values iso19139;7fc45be3-9aba-4198-920c-b8737112d522)
geonetwork-hostHelp: URL with catalog name only eg. http://www.fao.org/geonetwork.
geonetwork-useChangeDateForUpdateHelp: Use change date to detect changes on remote server. This will not update minor changes but improves speed on harvester.
geonetwork-xslfilterHelp: The XSL filter is applied to each metadata record
groupDescriptionHelp: A short description of the group.
groupNameHelp: Identifier for the group. Do not forget to add translation for the label.
groupWebsiteHelp: Website containing information about the group.
groupLogoHelp: Logo to use for representing the groups.
chooseOrDropResource: Wähle oder hinterlege hier eine Quelle
harvester-arcsdeHelp: Harvest metadata records from an ArcSDE database.
harvester-filesystemHelp: Harvest from a directory on the server
harvester-geoPRESTHelp: Harvest from an ESRI GeoPortal using the REST API.
harvester-geonetwork20Help: Harvest GeoNetwork node in 2.0 or lower version. Please notice that harvesting old GeoNetwork nodes is unsafe. The old nodes do not have unique site ids and this could cause unpredictable results (like removing nodes from other harvestings).
harvester-oaipmhHelp: Harvest using OAI Protocol for metadata harvesting 2.0
harvester-ogcwxsHelp: Harvest the GetCapabilities document from an OGC server (eg. WMS, WFS, WCS, SOS, WPS, CSW).
harvester-threddsHelp: The THREDDS Data Server (TDS) is a web server that provides metadata and data access for scientific datasets, using OPeNDAP, OGC WMS and WCS, HTTP, and other remote data access protocols.
harvester-webdavHelp: Harvest from a remote WebDAV or WAF server
harvester-wfsfeaturesHelp: Create metadata record or directory entries from WFS features.
harvester-z3950ConfigHelp: Load harvester configuration from remote server.
harvester-z3950Help: Remote search on a Z39.50 server.
harvesterGroupHelp: Only catalog administrator or user admin of this group will be able to manage this node.
harvesterNameHelp: The name describing the remote node.
harvesterValidateHelp: Invalid records will be rejected. Validation is based on the standard validation (ie. XSD, Schematrons).
indexingRecordsRelatedToTheThesaurus: Records related to this thesaurus are being indexed ...
iso19110: Geographic information - Methodology for feature cataloguing (ISO 19110:2005)
iso19110-help: ISO 19110 standard for describing Feature Types
iso19135: Geographic information - Procedures for item registration (ISO 19135:2005)
iso19135-help: 19135:2005 specifies procedures to be followed in establishing, maintaining and publishing registers of unique, unambiguous and permanent identifiers, and meanings that are assigned to items of geographic information. In order to accomplish this purpose, ISO 19135:2005 specifies elements of information that are necessary to provide identification and meaning to the registered items and to manage the registration of these items
java.vm.name: JVM Name
loadSamplesForSelectedSchema: Beispiele für die ausgewählten Standards anzeigen
loadSchemaSamplesOrTemplates: Beispiele und Vorlagen für Metadatenstandards laden
loadTemplatesForSelectedSchema: Vorlagen für die ausgewählten Standards wählen
logoUploadHelp: Drag & drop here one or more images to add to the catalog list of logos
map/isMapViewerEnabled-help: If unselected, the map tab will be disabled and will not be used.
map/is3DModeAllowed-help: If enabled, user can switch the map to 3D mode. The map viewer need to be enabled also. If you don't want to enable the 3D mode for all users, adding ?with3d in the URL will also load 3D mode.
map/isSaveMapInCatalogAllowed: Allow users to save maps as metadata record
map/isSaveMapInCatalogAllowed-help: From the map viewer, user can set the map title and abstract and save the map directly with the OWS context in the catalog as a metadata record.
metadata/resourceIdentifierPrefix-help: In the editor, a suggestion provides the capability to compute the resource identifier automatically. This identifier is computed by concatenating this prefix with the metadata identifier (eg. http://localhost:8080/geonetwork/srv/a1fd6bb7-6425-48b6-bca3-13c9e1bc4ab1).
metadataIdentifierTemplateUpdateError: An error ocurred saving the Metadata identifier template
metadataIdentifierTemplateDeletedError: An error ocurred deleting the Metadata identifier template
noCommitAvailable: No activity recorded. Enable the versionning on metadata record to follow changes.
oaipmh-FailedToGetSetsAndPrefix: Failed to retrieve sets and prefixes. Check server URL
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayer: Create record for each layer only using GetCapabilities information.
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayerHelp: Create record for each layer only using GetCapabilities information.
ogcwxs-createMetadataForEachLayerUsingMe: Create record for each layer using MetadataURL attributes.
ogcwxs-createThumbnailsHelp: During harvesting, for each layer a GetMap request is made based on the layer's bounding box. Only for WMS service.
oneRunOnlyHelp: This harvester will run only once and not schedule in the future.
optimizeIndexHelp: Optimize the lucene index.  This is ran automatically typically but can be forced if odd search results occur.
os.name: Systemname
processRecommendedOnHostChange-help: Sobald der Hostname des Katalogs geändert wurde, wird empfohlen alle Links, die im Katalog definiert sind, zu aktualisieren (z. Bsp. Vorschaubilder, Dokumente, XLinks). Klicken Sie hier, um {{old}} durch {{by}} zu ersetzen.
processRecommendedOnPrefixChange-help: After changing the identifier prefix, it's recommended to update all record identifiers. Click here to configure the update.
recordWithNoTitle: - Record with no title / wrongly indexed -
rebuildIndexHelp: Während der Index neu aufgebaut wird, können unvollständige Resultatelisten ausgegeben werden. Ausserdem ist die CSW GetRecords Operation verhindert. Gebrauchen Sie die Funktion, wenn der Katalog wenig benutzt wird. Es wird empfohlen, den Index neu aufzubauen wenn der Index neu konfiguriert wurde oder wenn Änderungen direkt in der Datenbank vorgenommen wurden.
reindexRecords-help: After updating keywords and when records are using XLinks, records using this thesaurus should be reindex (due to the XLinks cache system).
reloadLuceneConfigHelp: If the changes made in the configuration alter the index structure (eg. modifying analyzer), it's recommended to rebuild the index.
reportFileDownloadMetadata-description: Select criteria to extract a data download history. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
reportFileUploadMetadata-description: Select criteria to extract a data upload history. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
reportInternalMetadata-description: Select criteria to extract a list of internal records and the record owner’s information. This will allow for a record review to ensure completeness of records or if necessary the deletion of “blank” or “test” records. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
reportUpdatedMetadata-description: This report allows to extract a list of updated records and the record owner’s information for a specified last updated date range for import into Microsoft Access and Excel. This will allow for a review of records to ensure the currency of records or if necessary the deletion of old or expired records. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
reportUsers-description: Select criteria to extract a list of user names, emails and last login date. The report results can be imported into MS Access and Excel.
requirementDISABLED: Ignore this group, the schematron will not be ran even if criteria match
requirementREPORT_ONLY: Only Report errors, does not affect validity of metadata
schematronDescriptionGeneric: This criteria passes when the metadata has '{{type}}' with the value '{{value}}'
schematronDescriptionXpath: This criteria passes when the XPath is true: '{{value}}'
schematronInfo: The selected Schematron will be used to validate a metadata when all the criteria in one of the following groups evaluate to true for the metadata.
standardLoadHelp: In order to update an existing standard use its identifier.
standardRecordUUID: UUID of local metadata record with GeoNetwork Metadata Schema Archive (URL) as online resource
system/ui/defaultView: Choose the user interface to use
system/autodetect/enable-help: If set, the search language is automatically detected. Note that this doesn't work very well for short search terms.
system/autofixing/enable-help: When enabled, GeoNetwork automatically applies certain fixes when you save metadata (eg. last update date). Don't disable this option unless you know what you're doing (ie. update-fixed-info.xsl will not be applied anymore if disabled).
system/clickablehyperlinks/enable-help: If set, GeoNetwork will display clickable hyperlinks in the metadata.
system/csw/contactId-help: Choose the contact to be added to the GetCapabilities request. Create a custom user in the user management page if needed.
system/csw/enable-help: Enable CSW and all virtual CSW services. When not enable, an exception is returned.
system/csw/metadataPublic-help: When a transation insert a new record via the CSW-T protocol, automatically publish the record to all users.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath: Create element if it does not exist when using XPath in CSW trasaction.
system/csw/transactionUpdateCreateXPath-: If not checked, only existing element could be updated.
system/downloadservice/leave: Use metadata linkage as is - no changes to linkage
system/downloadservice/leave-help: Selecting this option means that GeoNetwork will not handle file downloads.
system/downloadservice/simple: Use GeoNetwork simple file download service (resources.get)
system/downloadservice/simple-help: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork with no further user input - it is the simplest download interface
system/downloadservice/withdisclaimer: Use GeoNetwork disclaimer and constraints service (file.disclaimer)
system/downloadservice/withdisclaimer-he: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork after they have agreed to accept any metadata constraints/generic disclaimer. The resource is bundled into a zip archive with an html description of the metadata constraints and a snapshot of the metadata record (as a MEF).
system/feedback/email-help: This is the administrator's email address used to send feedback.
system/feedback/mailServer/host-help: The SMTP host and port parameters are used to send emails to GeoNetwork's users when a resource is downloaded.
system/harvesting/mail/template-help: You can use the following strings on both template and subject. They will be replaced by the actual value. Total number of metadata imported: $$total$$. Number of metadata added: $$added$$. Number of metadata updated: $$updated$$. Number of metadata unchanged: $$unchanged$$. Number of metadata unretrievable: $$unretrievable$$. Number of metadata removed: $$removed$$. How many metadata does not validate: $$doesNotValidate$$. Harvester Name: $$harvesterName$$. Harvester Type: $$harvesterType$$. Error Message: $$errorMsg$$
system/hidewithheldelements: Metadata / ISO19139 / Nil reason attribute with held
system/inspire/enable-help: Enable INSPIRE CSW (ie. language support and INSPIRE GetCapabilities document) and INSPIRE indexing. INSPIRE themes thesaurus MUST be installed to properly index themes and annexes. Note: It does not enable the INSPIRE editor view mode (see iso19139/layout/config-editor.xml).
system/intranet/network-help: The network and netmask parameters are used to identify internal connections to GeoNetwork, that is, to identify the intranet group.
system/localrating/enable-help: If set, GeoNetwork will calculate user ratings for metadata from this node only (not distributed among other GeoNetwork nodes).
system/metadata/allThesaurus-help: If true then a virtual thesaurus will be created that contains all keywords in all other thesauri.  This is useful in editor when the name of the thesaurus is unimportant and only the keyword is important.  In order to ensure that the correct keyword blocks are maintained (with correct thesaurus name) enabling this will also enable a transform in update-fixed-info that will assign the keyword in the 'all' thesaurus to keyword blocks with the correct thesaurus for the keyword
system/metadataprivs/usergrouponly: Only set privileges to user's groups
system/metadatacreate/generateUuid-help: GeoNetwork creates assigns a random metadata UUID to the metadata created by a user (default). To assign the metadata UUID manually disable this option and fill the metadata UUID prefix.
system/oai/cachesize-help: The number of OAI resultSets that can be stored in the Cache.
system/oai/mdmode-help: Influences the behaviour of OAI when parameters from or until are supplied. If set to temporal extent, the temporal extent of the date described by the metadata is searched. If set to modification date, the date at which the metadata was last modified is searched. Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
system/oai/tokentimeout-help: The number of seconds a OAI resultset stays in the cache and can be scrolled using the OAI resumptionToken Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
system/oai/maxrecords-help: Number of maximum records to return in OAI responses
system/proxy/host-help: If set, GeoNetwork will use the provided proxy parameters when accessing remote nodes. For example, this is used during the harvesting.
system/proxy/ignorehostlist-help: To bypass specific hosts enter a specific IP address or host name such as www.mydomain.com or an address range using wildcards, such as 192.168.2.*. Use | to separate the different host values.
system/removedMetadata/dir-help: Directory used to store metadata (in MEF format) when they are deleted.
system/requestedLanguage/ignorechars: Characters to ignore when analyzing text
system/requestedLanguage/ignored: Ignore requested language for search results.
system/requestedLanguage/only-value1: All documents in all languages (No preferences)
system/requestedLanguage/only-value2: Prefer documents with translations requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value3: Prefer documents whose language is the requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value5: Document language is the requested language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value6: Prefer documents having translations in the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value7: Only documents having translations in the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value8: Prefer documents having the same language as the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/only-value9: Only documents having the same language as the UI language
system/requestedLanguage/preferUiLanguag: If auto detect search language is enabled enabling this will ensure that the metadata loaded will still have the translations provided in the UI Language when possible. If disabled then the translations will be in the detected search language.
system/requestedLanguage/sorted: Search results in requested language sorted on top
system/searchStats/enable-help: If set, Statistics on searches will be collected and stored in the database.
system/server/host-help: The server's host and port are used to create URLs to the GeoNetwork server. For example, they are used during metadata editing to create resource links and when returning the server's capabilities during a CS/W request.
system/site/name-help: The name displayed in different places (eg. news feed).
system/site/siteId-help: Unique catalogue identifier. After changing the site identifier, user should update the index and the logo from the administration panel.
system/xlinkResolver/enable-help: If set, XLinks to metadata fragments in records will be resolved.
system/xlinkResolver/localXlinkEnable-he: Local XLinks are using local://<lang>/<service> URL to make references to related sections instead of HTTP URL. Local XLinks are usually faster than HTTP XLinks.
system/xlinkResolver/ignore: Elements to ignore by XLink resolution
system/xlinkResolver/ignore-help: Comma separated list of elements to ignore by XLink resolution
system/z3950/enable-help: If set, during startup GeoNetwork will start the Z39.50 server component. This component uses the ISO23950 protocol.
system/z3950/port-help: Change the Z39.50 listening port. Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
metadata/workflow/draftWhenInGroup: Enable workflow for record created in the following groups
metadata/workflow/draftWhenInGroup-help: Regular expression for matching groups where record needs to be set with draft status automatically. eg. MYOCEAN-.* to match all groups starting with MYOCEAN-, GROUP1|GROUP2 to match GROUP1 or GROUP2.
thesaurusExternalHelp: External thesaurus are in read only mode.
thesaurusPlaceHelp: Thesaurus of type place contains bounding box of each concept. They could be use to automatically compute record extent from keywords.
thesaurusUploadHelp: Thesaurus in SKOS format are supported. File could have xml or rdf extensions.
thredds-DIF: Extract DIF metadata elements and create ISO metadata
thredds-UNIDATA: Extract Unidata dataset discovery metadata using fragments
thredds-createAtomicSubtemplates: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createAtomicSubtemplatesHelp: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createCollectionSubtemplates: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createCollectionSubtemplatesHelp: Create subtemplates for fragments and XLink them into template
thredds-createServiceMd: Create ISO19119 metadata for all services in the catalog
thredds-createServiceMdHelp: Create ISO19119 metadata for all services in the catalog
thredds-createThumbnails: Create thumbnails for any datasets delivered by WMS
thredds-createThumbnailsHelp: Create thumbnails for any datasets delivered by WMS
thredds-outputSchemaOnAtomicsDIF: Select schema for output metadata records
thredds-outputSchemaOnCollections: Select schema for output metadata records
thredds-templateId: Select template to combine with fragments
thredds-templateIdHelp: Select template to combine with fragments
totalNumberOfRecordsHelp: Total number of records visible to you.
searchesWithNoHits: Total number of searches with no result
typeOfServiceUsed: Type of services used for search
useCtrlClickToUnselect: Use CTRL + click to unselect a group
aReviewerInAGroupIsAlsoAnEditor: A reviewer in a group will also be set editor of this group
useLogoForCatalogFavicon: Use it for the node favorite icon
userUpdateError: User can't be created or updated
virtualCSWNameHelp: The virtual CSW name MUST start with csw-.
virtualCSWNameDescriptionHelp: A short description of this endpoint.
virtualCSWExplicitQueryHelp:
Arbitrary lucene query string that will be added to the query constructed from the parameters below.
WARNING: advanced users only.
wfsfeatures-createSubtemplatesHelp: Create subtemplates for each WFS feature
wfsfeatures-metadataLanguageHelp: The language of the metadata language
wfsfeatures-outputSchemaHelp: The output schema to request from the output schema
wfsfeatures-queryHelp: The WFS GetFeature Query to use for fetching the features
wfsfeatures-streamFeaturesHelp: If the response is large response, save it to disk instead of keeping the response in memory
wfsfeatures-stylesheetHelp: The stylesheet to apply to each feature for creating the metadata from each feature
wfsfeatures-templateId: Select template to combine with fragments
wfsfeatures-templateIdHelp: Select template to combine with fragments
workspace-help: Namespace prefix and namespace URL corresponding to the workspace data hase to be published in.
XSDVALIDATION: Accept metadata that are XSD Valid
SCHEMATRONVALIDATION: Accept metadata that are XSD and Schematron Valid
GNIDX-GEOWRITE: Error writing geometry to spatial index
GNIDX-BADNUMVALUE: Error converting lucene index value to a number
doSaveConfirm: Do you want to save your changes?
unsavedChangesWarning:
You have unsaved changes

Do you still want to leave the page and lose your changes?
region/getmap/background: Background map, URL or Named Layer ID
